Slimebound:AbsorbEndCombat.NAME: Heart of Goo
DESCRIPTIONS: Spawn a random Slime at the start of combat. NL At the end of combat, for each Spawned slime, heal #b3 HP.

Slimebound:AbsorbEndCombatUpgraded.NAME: Black Heart of Goo
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gHeart #gof #gGoo. Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the end of combat, for each Spawned slime, heal #b3 HP.

Slimebound:SlimedTailRelic.NAME: Slimed Tail
Slimebound:SlimedTailRelic.FLAVOR: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat, completely covered in slime.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you fall below 50% of your Maximum HP, spawn an Acid Slime, and the next time you take damage, your oldest slime is removed instead. (works once per combat).
This relic has been used this combat. It will become active again next combat.

Slimebound:PotencyRelic.NAME: Ooze Stone
Slimebound:PotencyRelic.FLAVOR: It is said to gain power based on your mood.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, spawn a Licking Slime and gain #b1 Potency.

Slimebound:ScrapOozeRelic.NAME: Scrap Ooze
Slimebound:ScrapOozeRelic.FLAVOR: A friend found in the Spire who enjoys treasure and leftover loot.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, spawn the Scrap Ooze. NL If Scrap Ooze is absorbed, it is instantly respawned instead of restoring HP. NL Scrap Ooze deals
damage per turn. NL At Rest sites, you can donate a card to the Scrap Ooze, increasing it's damage by 2.

Slimebound:PreparedRelic.NAME: Slimy Tea Set
Slimebound:PreparedRelic.FLAVOR: Definitely not the key to a refreshing night's rest.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you enter a Rest site, begin the next combat with a Prepare card that costs 0 for your first turn.

Slimebound:StudyCardRelic.NAME: Tiny Bowler Hat
Slimebound:StudyCardRelic.FLAVOR: Whosoever controls the hat, controls the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Study the Spire card to your hand. It costs 0.

Slimebound:AggressiveSlimeRelic.NAME: Goop Dweller
Slimebound:AggressiveSlimeRelic.FLAVOR: He followed me home. Can I keep it?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, spawn a Bruiser slime.
